channel.title: [P.I] Skillcape Issue
channel.description:
This picture pretty much explains it; [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/sfw2lk.png[/img]
The GFX its self is fine but while doing it with the animation seems to got at lest 2feet off the floor. It happens with all the cape emotes. Quite funny while doing HP and your character is floating in the air.
